nodes.text: Mhar'li was a human female pilot who was active decades after the Battle of Endor. She worked with a team of adventurers on Jakku to discover the secrets of a crashed New Republic corvette, the Starlight Wanderer.
Mhar'li is one of the pre-generated characters from Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game roleplaying box set, which was released in August of 2016.
